column6: Some things are missing from the mansion, including but not limited to: a pair of custom-made oversized shoes, all the candy, and one of Warren's cars. This can mean only one thing...ROADTRIP! Hank and Bobby head out on an adventure of their very own!
column8: | inker:Roger Cruz | penciller (cover):Eric Nguyen | writer:Jeff Parker | letterer:Nate Piekos | colorist:Val Staples
